name: R.C. Bot Inc.
description: R.C. Bot Inc. presents an entirely new gameplay technique that mirrors real life motion. All gameplay input is used to control Nvidia PhysX interactions such as forces, impulses and joint motors, things that exist in real life, and the entire game is animation and scripting free.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8 or 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 460 or similar DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible soundcard Additional Notes: Requirements for 60 frames per second in 1920x1080 FullHD, Built for 32-bit or 64-bit systems, prerequisites included, 5GB harddrive space required, gamepad required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8 or 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 3.4GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 or similar DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible soundcard Additional Notes: Requirements for 60 frames per second in 1920x1080 FullHD, Built for 32-bit or 64-bit systems, prerequisites included, 5GB harddrive space required, gamepad required

reviews.review_text: I can honestly say this was about as much fun as diarrhoea. Far too complicated control system. No idea how to even walk. What a waste of time and money.  I liked the graphics but that was literally it.
